column1: Kata Robata////I am not a big sushi fan but my friends are so I make like a good friend and tag along. One uneventful night
column2: we were bored and decided to do some sushi hopping. Ra for happy hour
column4: and Uptown Sushi for dessert. Let me tell you
column5: it definitely turned our night around and one lychee martini after another makes for darn good time.
